text: Hal Wantland (July 9, 1944 – April 8, 2008) was an American football defensive back. He played for the Miami Dolphins in 1966. He died on April 8, 2008, in Knoxville, Tennessee at age 63. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2008 deaths Category:American football defensive backs Category:Tennessee Volunteers football players Category:Miami Dolphins players
title: Hal Wantland
